movie_title: The Most Insane Weapon You Never Heard About
introduction: Get 50% off your first month of a monthly club with code KURZGESAGT at https://www.kiwico.com/kurzge

vocabulary.definition: designated as officially secret and accessible only by authorized personnel
vocabulary.example: Most of the information regarding the top secret project Sundial is still classified.

vocabulary.definition: the possible results or effects of an action, decision, or event
vocabulary.example: The implications of developing such powerful nuclear weapons were far-reaching and terrifying.

vocabulary.definition: the action of discouraging an action or event through instilling doubt or fear of the consequences
vocabulary.example: The existence of nuclear weapons served as a deterrence against large-scale conflicts.

vocabulary.definition: a Russian wooden doll with a series of progressively smaller dolls fitting inside one another
vocabulary.example: The design of the bomb was speculated to be similar to a nuclear matryoshka doll.

vocabulary.definition: involving or predicting a catastrophic event of ultimate doom and destruction
vocabulary.example: The potential impact of the Sundial bomb on the world was described as apocalyptic.

vocabulary.definition: relating to existence or the experience of existing
vocabulary.example: The threat posed by nuclear weapons raises existential questions about the future of humanity.
